items.title: Accumulate InterGlobe Aviation; target of Rs 6048: Asit C Mehta
items.description: Asit C Mehta recommended accumulate rating on InterGlobe Aviation with a target price of Rs 6048 in its research report dated April 02 2025.

items.title: Stock market holiday today: BSE, NSE to remain shut for Mahavir Jayanti
items.description: Trading on the NSE and the BSE will resume on April 11 (Friday).

items.title: Donald Trump's 90-day tariff pause sends GIFT Nifty soaring, signals strong start for Indian markets on April 11
items.description: The move, which Trump framed as a response to outreach from over 75 nations seeking talks, was enough to flip investor sentiment overnight.

items.title: Bulk & Block deals: Ashish Dhawan buys 2.17% stake in Northern Arc Capital on April 9
items.description: NOVA Global Opportunities Fund PCC - Touchstone offloaded 2,32,800 shares of ATC Energies System Ltd in a bulk deal on Wednesday, according to NSE data.

items.title: S&P500, Dow Jones erase gains as tariff escalations with China, EU intensify; Nasdaq Composite holds steady
items.description: After a brief period of relief, tensions remained high after China said it would slap an 84 percent tariff on U.S. goods starting Thursday, responding to Washington’s earlier move imposing 104 percent levies on Chinese imports.

items.title: IndiGo becomes the most valuable airline in the world as m-cap crosses Rs 2 lakh crore
items.description: IndiGo share price: The stock’s impressive run this year—up 13 percent so far—has propelled its valuation to nearly Rs 2 lakh crore ($23.3 billion).

items.title: FIIs sell Rs 4,358 crore worth of shares; DIIs buy Rs 2,976 crore on April 9
items.description: For the year so far, FIIs have been net sellers of shares worth Rs 1.72 lakh crore, while DIIs have net bought Rs 2.02 lakh crore worth of shares.

items.title: These sectors may benefit tomorrow as Trump pauses reciprocal tariffs for 90 days
items.description: After Trump made his 'Liberation Day' announcement and unveiled 26 percent tariff on India, Indian stock markets strongly reacted, accompanying global peers.
